alert.note: Alert for Casey; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Russell and south central Casey Counties through 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/... At 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cains Store to 6 miles northwest of Cabell. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Russell and south central Casey Counties, including the following locations... Jabez, Ono, Vinnie, Eli, Whittle, Windsor, Karlus and Rowena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
